column1: Local Foods////Only possible negative things to say is that this place is too popular-parking and finding a table can be tough at lunchtime and on the weekends.  That being said
column2: this is a go-to meal for us.  I love the posole and the pretzel bun is amazing.  Favorites are the smoked salmon sandwich
column4: and the crispy chicken sandwich.  The homemade chips are tasty.
